full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DRUG CU PA'I GO RIM RIN CHEN DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES LAS BZHI DRUG CU PA'I GO RIM RIN CHEN DO SHAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MDO SNGAGS ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI BANG MDZOD 'DZIN PA'I BKA' 'SGYUR BA ^AERTE NI SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BKA' BSKUL MA GNANG BA'I NGOR, ^BAN CHUNG SNYOMS LAS RATNA'I MING CAN GYIS RANG GI SHAG CHUNG AE WAm DGA' TSAL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, RATNA DHARMA WA DRAS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, SKYE 'GRO SROG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG, SROG BYED ZHING SKYONG YAB YUM GNYIS KYIS SNOD MIN LAG TU MA TSOR BAR BYA RA MDZOD, ,SA MA YA H'Um, BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAM, ,DGE'O,, ,,)
